text:
@DrainTheTrumps Dear Steve,

You're brilliant. However, please get some new clothes, or at least some new ties.  I love watching you, but you really need to freshen up your wardrobe.  It'll be good for your image.
Most sincerely,

Jeffrey D. Flagg
Sylmar, CA

Wishing you a most happy, healthy and fun Happy Birthday.

Jeffrey D. Flagg
Sylmar, CA

⚡️ “Trump asks Supreme Court to fast-track transgender military ban”
Trump should fast track his resignation, if he knows good for him

Sylmar, CA
It's not "fake news".  It's Trump himself.  He's one of the greatest of all ion U.S. history.

I always look forward to your tweets.  They're always spot on!
